[[Hanabi]] uses the [[Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms]] technique to hit and shut down sixty-four of the opponent's [[tenketsu]], with the final hit making the opponent spin in a vortex-like fashion. Then, Hanabi, after fussing about her hair, launches a [[Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm|vacuum]] of [[chakra]] at the opponent, stopping their spinning and sending them head-in into the ground.
